external_context.description: Summary and information about parent and sibling modules that help contextualize the existence and purpose of this module. This is only present when the module has a parent. Otherwise, it's an empty string.

internal_context.description: Summary and information about files directly within this specific module.

public_context.description: Summary and information about files directly within this module, as well as any of its children. This will be used by sibling modules, and modules outside of this module's hierarchy.
